Squizzy:
She nodded. She didn't understand the answer, but she hoped that it 
would be revealed to her in time.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> LadyHawk turned to Squizzy. "I'll create it when nature tells me 
to." She
> didn't understand the answer, she just knew that it was what her 
father had
> always told her.
